page.title: 03 The Church
page.content: There has been a church in Winterbourne Abbas since Saxon times. The rector lives in Martinstown and has three other churches to look after. There is a service once every sunday and about fifteen to twenty people attend. There have been several funerals but no marriages or baptisms since the present rector came.The Tower is square and has Gargoyles at each corner.Inside there is a balcony where the church band used to play.Another interesting thing about the church is the piscina,which is where the communion vessels are rinsed.
